CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 18, 1970, pg. 6, reads: "'Queens of Peace' - The Ladies Auxiliary of the Knights of St. Peter Claver, National Catholic Organization, set up a unit in Pittsburgh recently entitled 'Queen of Peace ' Court... The initiation ceremony took place at Ozanam Center, with representatives of the national order in charge. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of fourteen women, possibly including Charlene Wright, and Monsignor Paul Bassompierre, posed in Ozanam Center for Ladies Auxiliary of the Knights of St. Peter Claver event
